title: Mitarbeiter Sales / Customer Care (w/m) | Assistant Sales / Customer Care (f/m)
description:
We are the official distributor of Spare Parts and Accessories for KIA and HYUNDAI Motors in Central and Eastern Europe.
Currently we are looking to fill a vacancy for a position of administration within our Sales Department in order to ensure the smooth running of operational logistics in the process of supplying spare parts on behalf of KIA-Motors and Hyundai.
To support the processes of our new European organisation at our subsidiary in Brehna, we are looking to recruit a:

Mitarbeiter Sales / Customer Care (w/m)
Assistant Sales / Customer Care (f/m)

Functional areas:
* Main contact person and general assistance for 
  distributors in any case - managing and solving problems
* Solving backorder quickly with assistance of purchase 
  department and warehouse staff
* Solving technical problems regarding parts identification 
  & correctness with assistance of the technical departments

Candidate profile:
* Completed commercial training
* Knowledge of sales
* Experience with/identification ability to Automotive 
  business
* Fluent in spoken and written English
* Adequate knowledge of MS-Office
* Knowledge of AS 400 is desirable
* To be conversant with online programs and Internet
* High communication skills and profound customer focus
* Distinctive initiative and self-control
* Ability to work independently, while having the capacity 
  for teamwork

We offer:
* Salary in line with your experience
* Becoming part of a growing multi-cultural team

For any additional information we like to invite you at our website: http://www.mobis.co.kr.
how_to_apply:
Thank you for applying to MOBIS Parts Europe N.V. - a growing company within the Automotive sector. Please send us your cover letter, CV and all necessary certificates 
(email: maren.billian@mobisparts.de).

We aim to respond as promptly as possible to your application, however, due to the high level of CV's we receive, this process can take some time. Please be advised that documents will be treated in the strictest of confidence.
